Traits.Name: Rooted Resilience
Traits.Content: When reduced to 0 hit points, the Floral Astronaut instead falls to the ground, becoming incapacitated and with 1 hit point. It can use its reaction to immediately regenerate 5 hit points at the start of its turn thereafter.

Traits.Name: Nature's Touch
Traits.Content: The Floral Astronaut has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and is treated as a plant for the purposes of spells and abilities.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Floral Astronaut makes two attacks: one with Vine Grasp and one with Thorn Strike.

Actions.Name: Vine Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., dealing 10 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and grappling the target.

Actions.Name: Thorn Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, dealing 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Spore Bloom
Actions.Content: The Floral Astronaut releases a cloud of spores in a 10-foot radius. Creatures within this area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned and lightly blinded for 1 minute. The Floral Astronaut can use this action again after a recharge (5-6).
